description: A witty and educational story set in a math classroom, highlighting the importance of the equal sign through the interaction between Ethan and Mia.
title: The Humble Equal Sign
n_1: Ethan is writing math equations on the board, Mia watches curiously.
n_2: Ethan points at the equal sign, explaining its significance.
n_3: Ethan shares the joke about the equal sign, Mia listens.
n_4: Both share a laugh, appreciating the humor in math.
c1_1: See this? It's an equal sign.
c1_2: It symbolizes balance, neither less nor more.
c1_3: It's humble because it knows its worth.
c2_4: Absolutely, especially with jokes like these!
